item.title: WeChat conversation with 何蒨 (Hé Qiàn), journalist for the People’s Daily
item.description: WeChat conversation with 何蒨 (Hé Qiàn), journalist for the People’s Daily April 9, 2021, at 18:29 +0800 (China Standard Time) 何蒨 (Hé Qiàn): Qian He People’s daily online April 14, 2021, at 10:10 +0800 (China Standard Time) Vincent B. Le Corre: Bonjour, Vincent B. Le
